frontmatter.title: Module 1: Intro to Neotoma2 R Package
frontmatter.description: In this module, you will learn how to write your own Jupyter Notebook. In Module 2 you will also learn how to install dependencies and configure your conda environment. In Module 4 we will talk more in detail about what a Binder entails.

frontmatter.title: Module 2: Neotoma2 Core Commands
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you how to organize your environments using conda

frontmatter.title: Module 3: Synthesis With Neotoma2 - Helper Functions
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you about Version Control and how to use Git and Github.

frontmatter.title: Module 4: Synthesis With Neotoma2
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you how to use the Binder properly guaranteeing reproducibility of your notebooks and repositories.

frontmatter.title: Module 5: Synthesis With Neotoma2
frontmatter.description: In this module you will create, edit and run reproducible R code documents using RMarkdown.

frontmatter.title: References and Resources
frontmatter.description: Here are scripts to re-use and links to additional references and topics to learn.
